You wouldn't be able to guess the stagge.content: Tamannaah Bhatia looked like a doll as she recently stepped out wearing a soft pink gown by the luxury label Versace.Assisted by celebrity fashion stylist Leepakshi Ellawadi, Tamannaah accessorised her look with a pair of pearl statement earrings and a matching pair of blush-pink pumps.Tamannaah's pastel pink outfit features satin fabric, draped jersey panels, a plunging neckline, a sleeveless design accented with Medusa '95 hardware on one shoulder and a striking thigh-high side slit.She was helped in the makeup department by artist Florian Hurel who gave her a makeover with pink eyeshadow, mascara-covered lashes and a nude lipstick.The gown by Versace is worth Rs 4.

American fitness guru Richard Simmons ba.content: The detailed post came a day after he posted a cryptic post where he said he was dying.His fans became concerned after he posted that he was “dying” in a social media post.The truth is we all are dying.Every day we live we are getting closer to our death.Now I am getting a little bit nervous.

Choli Ke Peeche: Kareena's song from Cre.content: Kareena Kapoor is channelling Madhuri Dixit so hard in a new song from Crew.The new song "Choli Ke Peeche" is a collage of the Crew trailer and teaser shots.The song "Naina" from Crew was released a few days back.It's a new rendition of Ila Arun's song "Ghagra".The new song is called "Choli Ke Peeche".

Bhaiyya Ji: Meet Manoj Bajpayee's new ba.content: Also read: Paatal Lok 2 to Mirzapur 3: New seasons coming up of these popular showsOn collaborating with Manoj after Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, Apoorv said, "With Bhaiyya Ji, we are embarking on a journey to portray the raw and unfiltered essence of the characters against the backdrop of intense revenge drama and showcase the strength & emotions of family bonds.The ace star will next be seen in action entertainer Bhaiyya Ji in the Apoorv Singh Karki directorial.After a hard-hitting subject of Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, I wanted to explore a completely different style of cinema and Bhaiyya Ji was the apt film.Manoj will return to the screen after his praise-worthy ZEE5 courtroom drama Sirf Ek Banda Kaafi Hai in which he fights for justice for a victim of rape and abuse."Also read: In pics: Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas and Malti Marie visit Ayodhya

New character posters from House of Drag.content: "Also read: From Demon Slayer to My Hero Academia: All anime releases in Spring 2024, date and where to watchLike before, House of the Dragon season 2 will be available on HBO and will stream on Max.It was previously reported by Deadline that House of the Dragon showrunner Ryan Condal will have season 2 pick up “where we left off”.The first character posters from House of the Dragon season 2 are a treat for the eyes as HBO’s Game of Thrones prequel comes back heavy.The new posters of House of the Dragon season 2 are out and the makers have made it quite difficult for fans to choose between the two factions.What we do expect from the upcoming season is a lot of sudden deaths, murders and revenge as Team Green and Team Black are vying for each other’s blood after a climactic ending to season 1.

Sundance Film Festival announces dates f.content: Dates for Sundance 2025 are finally set as the Sundance Institute announced that the film festival will take place from January 23 to February 2.With the next year’s fest scheduled for later in January and into February, it inches closer to dates for the Berlin Film Festival.In its announcement, director of the Sundance, Eugene Hernandez said, “While the next Sundance Film Festival is still 10 months away, we’re already laying the foundation for the 2025 edition, looking ahead to sharing a new group of artists’ work with audiences at the start of next year.We’ll see you next year January 23–February 2, 2025.It is the largest independent film festival in the US.

From Demon Slayer to My Hero Academia: A.content:
Here's your one-stop guide to the Spring 2024 anime series schedule, release time and where to watch them.The winter season of anime this year was somewhat underwhelming with only Solo Leveling topping the charts, but fans are looking forward to the upcoming Spring of 2024 with high expectations.April 1
Gods’ Games We Play
Where to watch: TBA
Release Time:  21:30There are many exciting titles to look forward to, such as the much-anticipated Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc and the blockbuster hit, Blue Lock.

Dhanush to star in biopic of veteran mus.content: Actor Dhanush will be starring in what he calls a dream project in his career, the biopic of veteran musician, composer and singer, Ilaiyaraja, who continues to contribute to the field of music for nearly five decades.com/UvMnWRuh9XSharing a promotional poster of the film on X, formerly known as Twitter, Dhanush expressed it was an honour for him to play the veteran musician on screen.Referring to the big challenge and responsibility of playing the veteran musician in the biopic, Dhanush expressed optimism that Ilaiyarajaa's music would guide and teach him on how to act, as it had done all these years.Veteran actor Kamal Haasan, and veteran director Bharathiraja, among others were part of the film's promotional event held on Wednesday (Mar 20), in Chennai.Directed by Arun Matheswaran, whom Dhanush had worked with in his recent outing 'Captain Miller', the Ilaiyarajaa biopic will have cinematography by veteran lensman Nirav Shah.

In pics: Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas and.content: After a busy night with Prime Video’s multiple films and shows announcement event, global sensation Priyanka Chopra was spotted in Ayodhya at Ram Mandir with her husband Nick Jonas and their daughter Malti Marie.Actor Priyanka Chopra Jonas, husband and singer Nick Jonas and their daughter Maltie Marie Jonas offered prayers at Ram Janmabhoomi Temple in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh.The couple offered their prayers at the beautiful temple with their two-year-old daughter.Priyanka attended a Bulgari event and then made time for Prime Video Presents event in Mumbai where she showcased her upcoming production venture Women of My Billion.com/WdWmcrXkwgIt was their first visit to the Ram temple after its grand consecration ceremony on January 22.

Priyanka Chopra reunites with Karan Joha.content:
Priyanka Chopra and Karan Johar reunited publicly on Amazon Prime Video event on Tuesday in Mumbai.Priyanka Chopra's new project

Priyanka was at the Prime Video Presents event on Tuesday to launch her new project- a documentary called Women of My Billion which her production banner Purple Pebble Pictures has produced.In the viral video, Priyanka Chopra and Karan Johar can be seen sharing the stage before the actress attempted to leave the stage.Last year in March, Priyanka Chopra appeared on Dax Shepherd’s podcast, Armchair Expert and made shocking revelations about politics and camps in the Hindi film industry that drove her out of India and resort to Hollywood.The two seems to have put their grievances behind as PC even made an appearance on Koffee With Karan a few seasons back.

Oscar-winning director Jonathan Glazer f.content: Looks like Jonathan Glazer has found some support from the rest of Hollywood which doesn’t think that his Oscars speech after winning Best International Feature Film for The Zone of Interest was out of place.”After winning Best Film in the International Feature category, Jonathan walked up on the stage and said, “Our film shows where dehumanisation leads at its worst.”Directors Asif Kapadia and Jesse Peretz also expressed support for Jonathan Glazer’s speech.The band Massive Attack also posted on X, “Jonathan Glazer is a filmmaker of the highest integrity, craft & bravery.The filmmaker started this week on a low after nearly 500 Jewish celebrities issued a letter denouncing his Oscars speech as they wrote: “We refute our Jewishness being hijacked for the purpose of drawing a moral equivalence between a Nazi regime that sought to exterminate a race of people and an Israeli nation that seeks to avert its own extermination.

Paatal Lok 2 to Mirzapur 3: New seasons.content: New seasons of popular shows Mirzapur, Paatal Lok and Panchayat were announced on Tuesday at the Prime Video Presents event in Mumbai.While some new shows, including Citadel Honey Bunny starring Varun Dhawan and Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Rana Connection, were launched at the event, the announcement of the sequel of some popular Prime Video titles like Paatal Lok, Panchayat and Mirzapur got fans excited.Prime Video announced a whopping 70 titles- both movies and series- across genres and languages on Tuesday at a star-studded event in the city.

Johnny Depp responds to 'Blow' co-star L.content: So I just wanted to make sure we’re cool and everything.’”She continued, “I just looked at him, and I was like, ‘I don’t know what you’re talking about?Johnny Depp has responded to harassment claims by co-star Lola Glaudini with whom he worked on the film Blow.’”Lola Glaudini just stopped herself from crying after the episode on the film set.In a statement to Deadline, Johnny Depp’s reps said, “Johnny always prioritises good working relationships with cast and crew and this recounting differs greatly from the recollection of other members on set at the time.

Rust shooting case: Alec Baldwin accused.content: According to court documents, a video was made available to NBC News a night before the grand jury was set to convene.Alec Baldwin has been accused of leaking footage from the shooting of the film Rust to the media in an attempt to receive a favourable outcome in his November grand jury hearing on the death of a cinematographer on set when the gun he was holding went off."Counsel for the state is concerned that any recordings of hearings related to the grand jury proceedings will be used to continue to taint the grand jury process by the target and/or his counsel.""The videos were released to the national press on the eve of the grand jury proceeding in an effort to taint the grand jurors and the grand jury process," the documents state.In the video, the actor can be heard telling crew members to move out of the path of the gun in the footage.

Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez divorce f.content: The two had separated a year ago but their divorce got finalised today with the pop star making a one-time settlement of $1.At the time of the Covid lockdown, Ariana and Dalton stayed together.These terms include a one-time payment of $1,250,000 to Gomez with no future alimony, giving him half of the proceeds of the sale of their Los Angeles home and paying up to $25,000 toward his attorneys’ fees.The two were happy together before both got busy with their own work and started spending more time away from each other.Ariana and Dalton were married for nearly three years.

Shahid Kapoor plants a 'thank you kiss'.content:
What Shahid said to Vijay

Shahid was hosting a segment at the Prime Video Presents event and called Vijay Deverakonda and Mrunal Thakur on stage to announce their upcoming film Family Star.Actors Shahid Kapoor and Vijay Deverakonda shared a sweet moment on stage at the recent Prime Video event in Mumbai on Tuesday (Mar 19).Two of Sandeep Reddy Vanga's most popular characters, Kabir Singh and Arjun Reddy recently met up at an event in Mumbai.Shahid thanked Vijay on stage and candidly mentioned that without Arjun Reddy there would be no Kabir Singh.Sandeep Reddy Vanga directed Vijay in the Telugu film Arjun Reddy.

Quiet on Set documentary: Disturbing sce.content: Disturbing and unsettling scenes of Ariana Grande being "sexualised" on Nickelodeon have resurfaced with the release of the new Investigation Discovery documentary, Quiet On Set: The Dark Side Of Kids TV." Another user wrote, "I’m not even 10 minutes into “Quiet On Set” and I’m already cringing… after the Jamie Lynn Spears & Ariana Grande clips I already know this is gonna be really hard to watch."com/rlIUIngfIbTaking to X, a netizen expressed disgust over Ariana's resurfaced videos and wrote, "Finally watching Quiet On Set and… WOW.I recommend watching HBO ‘All Quiet on the Set.The resurfaced clips, which were aired during the debut episode of Quiet On Set, show Grande engaging in actions that many view as inappropriate for her age at the time.

Citadel’s Indian spin-off gets a title;.content: On Tuesday, Prime Video India released the first poster of the upcoming series, revealing its title as, Citadel: Honey Bunny.In a statement, Prime Video India described Citadel: Honey Bunny as having "a riveting narrative that fuses the pulse-pounding elements of a gritty spy action thriller with the heartwarming allure of a love story, all set against the vibrant tapestry of the 90s.With the latest announcement of Citadel: Honey Bunny, fans were reassured that the Indian series is not a remake but a spin-off, offering a unique storyline within the Citadel universe.Other than Citadel: Honey Bunny, Varun is currently working on a remake of Atlee's 2016 Tamil film Theri, titled Baby John.Created by the Russo Brothers, Citadel made its debut on Prime Video in April last year, featuring Richard Madden and Priyanka Chopra as elite agents in the spy agency Citadel.

Extraordinary Attorney Woo's Kang Tae-oh.content: Actor Kang Tae-oh, known for his role in Extraordinary Attorney Woo, has completed his military service and was discharged on Tuesday.The actor, who entered the South Korean military in September 2022, expressed gratitude for his time in the service and revealed that he fixed his bad habits and earned only good things.During his military service, Tae-oh participated in significant events, including reading the memorandum at the 2023 memorial service on Hyeonchungil (Memorial Day in South Korea) and serving as an assistant instructor for the Recruit Training Centre.In a note shared with fans, Tae-oh stated, "I enlisted after receiving great love from everyone after wrapping up 'Extraordinary Attorney Woo'." I faced the end of my 20s and the start of my 30s in the military, and it was a meaningful time during which I fixed my bad habits and learned only good things.
